reviewText: Really interesting. I can recommend this book to anyone interested in the subject of water.

This should be shared in schools. Magnificent documentary.
Perfect transaction. I recommend seller and product !

Subject matter handled in a scientific way that will blow your mind!  I am buying lots of this DVD to give as gifts.  Water is not just a fluid - it hold memory.  And the most amazing fact given in this DVD is that "water was not created"....wow. always here.
Buy this, and change your life!

I subscribed to Gaia through Amazon video just to watch this documentary and it did not disappoint. It is absolutely fascinating, giving me more details from what I first learned from Dr. Emoto in What the Bleep Do We Know nearly 12 years ago. I have to wonder why this science/knowledge isn't more readily adopted. If everyone understood it and took actions to modify the way we treat, view and consume water,  the world would be a healthier, happier, more vibrant place. This film will definitely have a life changing impact on me and I can't wait to hear the reactions of my loved ones as I share it with those around me.
great for all ages - brings back a sense of wonder
It changed my life and everyone that I show it to it changes theirs!

This documentary explains the influence of water in our world and how it affects our overall health. There are varying energetic levels of water from pure to municipal water. Our thoughts and intentions directly influence the water. Fascinating information validating many other similar experiments from history. Nothing new, but updated information.
It is a fascinating video and I have shared it with my family.
